forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 11am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny. High near 88, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy. Low around 71, with temperatures rising to around 73 overnight. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
